content: Hello, Rachel. Can we have a practice conversation, please?
Of course! I'd be happy to have a practice conversation with you. What would you like to talk about?
I want to talk about what I did, what you did this weekend.

That sounds like a great topic! I'll start. This weekend, I went hiking with some friends. We explored a beautiful trail in the mountains. It was so refreshing to be surrounded by nature. How about you? What did you do this weekend?
